committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to raise the maximum pay ceiling for General Schedule employees, and to increase the rates of basic pay for certain Federal executive and judicial offices and positions.

summary.text: Raises the maximum pay ceiling for Levels III, IV, and V of the Executive Schedule for General Schedule employees. Increases the rates of basic pay for Federal district court judges, judges of the Customs Courts, and Court of Claims commissioners.

titles.title: A bill to raise the maximum pay ceiling for General Schedule employees, and to increase the rates of basic pay for certain Federal executive and judicial offices and positions.
